blocks.name: carea
blocks.content: Area of regions in the complex plane.

blocks.name: df-area
blocks.content: Define the area of a subset of ` RR X. RR ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jun-2015.)

blocks.name: dmarea
blocks.content: The domain of the area function is the set of finitely measurable subsets of ` RR X. RR ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dmarea(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cdm(carea)), w3a(wss(c0, cxp(cr, cr)), wral(s0, cr, wcel(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))), cibl)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  3bitri(wcel(c0, cdm(carea)), w3a(wss(c0, cxp(cr, cr)), wral(s0, cr, wcel(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))), cibl)), wcel(c0, crab(hs0, cpw(cxp(cr, cr)), wa(wral(s0, cr, wcel(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))), cibl)))), wa(wcel(c0, cpw(cxp(cr, cr))), wa(wral(s0, cr, wcel(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))), cibl))))
  eleq2i(c0, cdm(carea), crab(hs0, cpw(cxp(cr, cr)), wa(wral(s0, cr, wcel(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))), cibl))))
  dmmpti(hs1, carea, crab(hs0, cpw(cxp(cr, cr)), wa(wral(s0, cr, wcel(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))), cibl))), citg(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs1), csn(cv(s0))))))
  itgex(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs1), csn(cv(s0)))))
  df-area(hs1, hs0, s0)
  elrab(hs0, c0, cpw(cxp(cr, cr)), wa(wral(s0, cr, wcel(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))), cibl)), wa(wral(s0, cr, wcel(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))), cibl)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s0, cr, wcel(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))), cibl), wral(s0, cr, wcel(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))), cibl))
  ralbidv(s0, cr, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr)), wcel(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr)))
  eleq1d(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq1d(cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))), cibl, cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  mpteq2dv(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))), cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2d(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  imaeq1(cv(hs0), c0, csn(cv(s0)))
  bitr4i(wa(wcel(c0, cpw(cxp(cr, cr))), wa(wral(s0, cr, wcel(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))), cibl))), w3a(wss(c0, cxp(cr, cr)), wral(s0, cr, wcel(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))), cibl)), wa(wss(c0, cxp(cr, cr)), wa(wral(s0, cr, wcel(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))), cibl))))
  anbi1i(wcel(c0, cpw(cxp(cr, cr))), wa(wral(s0, cr, wcel(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))), cibl)), wss(c0, cxp(cr, cr)))
  elpw2(c0, cxp(cr, cr))
  xpex(cr, cr)
  reex()
  3anass(wss(c0, cxp(cr, cr)), wral(s0, cr, wcel(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))), cibl))
  diff.hs1.c(crab(hs0, cpw(cxp(cr, cr)), wa(wral(s0, cr, wcel(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))), cibl))))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cxp(cr, cr)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wral(s0, cr, wcel(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))), cibl)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: areambl
blocks.content: The fibers of a measurable region are finitely measurable subsets of ` RR ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm areambl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(carea)), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cima(c0, csn(c1)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(c1))), cr)))
} = {
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(carea)), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(cima(c0, csn(c1)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(c1))), cr)), wcel(cima(c0, csn(c1)), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cdm(carea)), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(cima(c0, csn(c1)), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr)), wral(hs0, cr, wcel(cima(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))))
  simp2bi(wcel(c0, cdm(carea)), wral(hs0, cr, wcel(cima(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wss(c0, cxp(cr, cr)), wcel(cmpt(hs0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(cv(hs0))))), cibl))
  dmarea(hs0, c0)
  rspccva(hs0, cr, c1, wcel(cima(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr)), wcel(cima(c0, csn(c1)), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr)))
  eleq1d(cima(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr), cima(c0, csn(c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  imaeq2d(c0, csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c1)
  mp2b(wb(wcel(cima(c0, csn(c1)), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr)), wa(wcel(cima(c0, csn(c1)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(c1))), cr))), wf(cvol, cdm(cvol), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wfn(cvol, cdm(cvol)))
  volf()
  ffn(cvol, cdm(cvol), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  elpreima(cvol, cdm(cvol), cima(c0, csn(c1)), cr)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cima(c0, csn(c1)), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm areambl(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ dom(area)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ)→((c0 " { c1 })∈ dom(vol)∧(vol `(c0 " { c1 }))∈ ℝ))
} = {
  sylib((c0 ∈ dom(area)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ), ((c0 " { c1 })∈ dom(vol)∧(vol `(c0 " { c1 }))∈ ℝ), (c0 " { c1 })∈(`' vol " ℝ))
  sylan(c0 ∈ dom(area), c1 ∈ ℝ, (c0 " { c1 })∈(`' vol " ℝ), ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ,(c0 " { hs0 })∈(`' vol " ℝ)))
  simp2bi(c0 ∈ dom(area), ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ,(c0 " { hs0 })∈(`' vol " ℝ)), c0 ⊆(ℝ × ℝ), (hs0 ∈ ℝ ↦(vol `(c0 " { hs0 })))∈ L^1)
  dmarea(hs0, c0)
  rspccva(hs0, cr, c1, (c0 " { hs0 })∈(`' vol " ℝ), (c0 " { c1 })∈(`' vol " ℝ))
  eleq1d((c0 " { hs0 }), (`' vol " ℝ), (c0 " { c1 }), hs0 = c1)
  imaeq2d(c0, { hs0 }, { c1 }, hs0 = c1)
  sneq(hs0, c1)
  mp2b(((c0 " { c1 })∈(`' vol " ℝ)↔((c0 " { c1 })∈ dom(vol)∧(vol `(c0 " { c1 }))∈ ℝ)), (vol : dom(vol)→(0[[,]]+∞)), vol[Fn]dom(vol))
  volf()
  ffn(cvol, dom(vol), (0[[,]]+∞))
  elpreima(cvol, dom(vol), (c0 " { c1 }), cr)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 " { c1 })∈(`' vol " ℝ))
}

blocks.name: areass
blocks.content: A measurable region is a subset of ` RR X. RR ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jun-2015.)

blocks.name: dfarea
blocks.content: Rewrite ~ df-area self-referentially. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfarea(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wceq(carea, cmpt(s0, cdm(carea), citg(s1, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  eqtr4i(carea, cmpt(s0, cdm(carea), citg(s1, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))))), cmpt(s0, crab(hs0, cpw(cxp(cr, cr)), wa(wral(s1, cr, wcel(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s1, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1))))), cibl))), citg(s1, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))))))
  mpteq1i(s0, cdm(carea), citg(s1, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))), crab(hs0, cpw(cxp(cr, cr)), wa(wral(s1, cr, wcel(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s1, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1))))), cibl))))
  dmmpti(s0, carea, crab(hs0, cpw(cxp(cr, cr)), wa(wral(s1, cr, wcel(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s1, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1))))), cibl))), citg(s1, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))))
  itgex(s1, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))))
  df-area(s0, hs0, s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, carea)
  diff.carea.s(s0)
  diff.crab.s(s0, hs0, cpw(cxp(cr, cr)), wa(wral(s1, cr, wcel(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s1, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1))))), cibl)))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cxp(cr, cr))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, cr, cr)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wral(s1, cr, wcel(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))), wcel(cmpt(s1, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1))))), cibl))
  diff.wral.s(s0, s1, cr, wcel(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))
  diff.cima.s(s0, ccnv(cvol), cr)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, cvol)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cmpt(s1, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1))))), cibl)
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1)))))
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1))))
  diff.cvol.s(s0)
  diff.cima.s(s0, cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cibl.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfarea(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  ⊢ area =(s0 ∈ dom(area)↦ S.(ℝ,(vol `(s0 " { s1 })), s1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  eqtr4i(carea, (s0 ∈ dom(area)↦ S.(ℝ,(vol `(s0 " { s1 })), s1)), (s0 ∈ { hs0 ∈ P((ℝ × ℝ))|(∀(s1 ∈ ℝ,(hs0 " { s1 })∈(`' vol " ℝ))∧(s1 ∈ ℝ ↦(vol `(hs0 " { s1 })))∈ L^1)} ↦ S.(ℝ,(vol `(s0 " { s1 })), s1)))
  mpteq1i(s0, dom(area), S.(ℝ,(vol `(s0 " { s1 })), s1), { hs0 ∈ P((ℝ × ℝ))|(∀(s1 ∈ ℝ,(hs0 " { s1 })∈(`' vol " ℝ))∧(s1 ∈ ℝ ↦(vol `(hs0 " { s1 })))∈ L^1)})
  dmmpti(s0, carea, { hs0 ∈ P((ℝ × ℝ))|(∀(s1 ∈ ℝ,(hs0 " { s1 })∈(`' vol " ℝ))∧(s1 ∈ ℝ ↦(vol `(hs0 " { s1 })))∈ L^1)}, S.(ℝ,(vol `(s0 " { s1 })), s1))
  itgex(s1, cr, (vol `(s0 " { s1 })))
  df-area(s0, hs0, s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, carea)
  diff.carea.s(s0)
  diff.crab.s(s0, hs0, P((ℝ × ℝ)), (∀(s1 ∈ ℝ,(hs0 " { s1 })∈(`' vol " ℝ))∧(s1 ∈ ℝ ↦(vol `(hs0 " { s1 })))∈ L^1))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, (ℝ × ℝ))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, cr, cr)
  diff.wa.s(s0, ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ,(hs0 " { s1 })∈(`' vol " ℝ)), (s1 ∈ ℝ ↦(vol `(hs0 " { s1 })))∈ L^1)
  diff.wral.s(s0, s1, cr, (hs0 " { s1 })∈(`' vol " ℝ))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (hs0 " { s1 }), (`' vol " ℝ))
  diff.cima.s(s0, `' vol, cr)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, cvol)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (s1 ∈ ℝ ↦(vol `(hs0 " { s1 }))), cibl)
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, cr, (vol `(hs0 " { s1 })))
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cvol, (hs0 " { s1 }))
  diff.cvol.s(s0)
  diff.cima.s(s0, hs0, { s1 })
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cibl.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: areaf
blocks.content: Area measurement is a function whose values are nonnegative reals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm areaf() {
  |- wf(carea, cdm(carea), co(nat0, cico, cpnf))
} = {
  fmpti(hs0, carea, cdm(carea), co(nat0, cico, cpnf), citg(hs1, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))))))
  dfarea(hs0, hs1)
  sylanbrc(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(carea)), wcel(citg(hs1, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))))), co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), wcel(citg(hs1, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))))), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, citg(hs1, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1)))))))
  itgrecl(hs1, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(carea)))
  itgge0(hs1, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(carea)))
  simp3bi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(carea)), wcel(cmpt(hs1, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))))), cibl), wss(cv(hs0), cxp(cr, cr)), wral(hs1, cr, wcel(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))), cima(ccnv(cvol), cr))))
  dmarea(hs1, cv(hs0))
  simprd(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(carea)), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wcel(cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1)))), cr), wcel(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))), cdm(cvol)))
  breqtrrd(nat0, cle, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1)))), cfv(covol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(carea)), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)))
  3syl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(carea)), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(covol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))))), wcel(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))), cdm(cvol)), wss(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))), cr))
  mblss(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))))
  ovolge0(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))))
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(carea)), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wceq(cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1)))), cfv(covol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))))), wcel(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))), cdm(cvol)))
  simpld(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(carea)), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wcel(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1)))), cr))
  areambl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  mblvol(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))))
  elrege0(citg(hs1, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(hs1))))))
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(carea))
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat0, cico, cpnf))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(carea)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm areaf() {
  ⊢ (area : dom(area)→(0[[,)]+∞))
} = {
  fmpti(hs0, carea, dom(area), (0[[,)]+∞), S.(ℝ,(vol `(hs0 " { hs1 })), hs1))
  dfarea(hs0, hs1)
  sylanbrc(hs0 ∈ dom(area), S.(ℝ,(vol `(hs0 " { hs1 })), hs1)∈(0[[,)]+∞), S.(ℝ,(vol `(hs0 " { hs1 })), hs1)∈ ℝ, 0[≤]S.(ℝ,(vol `(hs0 " { hs1 })), hs1))
  itgrecl(hs1, cr, (vol `(hs0 " { hs1 })), hs0 ∈ dom(area))
  itgge0(hs1, cr, (vol `(hs0 " { hs1 })), hs0 ∈ dom(area))
  simp3bi(hs0 ∈ dom(area), (hs1 ∈ ℝ ↦(vol `(hs0 " { hs1 })))∈ L^1, hs0 ⊆(ℝ × ℝ), ∀(hs1 ∈ ℝ,(hs0 " { hs1 })∈(`' vol " ℝ)))
  dmarea(hs1, hs0)
  simprd((hs0 ∈ dom(area)∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ), (vol `(hs0 " { hs1 }))∈ ℝ, (hs0 " { hs1 })∈ dom(vol))
  breqtrrd(nat0, cle, (vol `(hs0 " { hs1 })), (vol* `(hs0 " { hs1 })), (hs0 ∈ dom(area)∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ))
  3syl((hs0 ∈ dom(area)∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ), 0[≤](vol* `(hs0 " { hs1 })), (hs0 " { hs1 })∈ dom(vol), (hs0 " { hs1 })⊆ ℝ)
  mblss((hs0 " { hs1 }))
  ovolge0((hs0 " { hs1 }))
  syl((hs0 ∈ dom(area)∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ), (vol `(hs0 " { hs1 }))=(vol* `(hs0 " { hs1 })), (hs0 " { hs1 })∈ dom(vol))
  simpld((hs0 ∈ dom(area)∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ), (hs0 " { hs1 })∈ dom(vol), (vol `(hs0 " { hs1 }))∈ ℝ)
  areambl(hs0, hs1)
  mblvol((hs0 " { hs1 }))
  elrege0(S.(ℝ,(vol `(hs0 " { hs1 })), hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(dom(area))
  diff.hs0.c((0[[,)]+∞))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ∈ dom(area))
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
}

blocks.name: areacl
blocks.content: The area of a measurable region is a real number. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jun-2015.)

blocks.name: areage0
blocks.content: The area of a measurable region is greater than or equal to zero. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jun-2015.)

blocks.name: areaval
blocks.content: The area of a measurable region is greater than or equal to zero. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm areaval(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cdm(carea)), wceq(cfv(carea, c0), citg(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cdm(carea), carea, citg(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))), citg(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))))
  itgeq2dv(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))), cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2d(cvol, cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  imaeq1d(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  dfarea(hs0, s0)
  itgex(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(carea))
  diff.hs0.c(citg(s0, cr, cfv(cvol, cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm areaval(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ dom(area)→(area ` c0)= S.(ℝ,(vol `(c0 " { s0 })), s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, dom(area), carea, S.(ℝ,(vol `(c0 " { s0 })), s0), S.(ℝ,(vol `(hs0 " { s0 })), s0))
  itgeq2dv(s0, cr, (vol `(hs0 " { s0 })), (vol `(c0 " { s0 })), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2d(cvol, (hs0 " { s0 }), (c0 " { s0 }), (hs0 = c0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ))
  imaeq1d(hs0, { s0 }, c0, (hs0 = c0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ))
  simpl(hs0 = c0, s0 ∈ ℝ)
  dfarea(hs0, s0)
  itgex(s0, cr, (vol `(c0 " { s0 })))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(dom(area))
  diff.hs0.c(S.(ℝ,(vol `(c0 " { s0 })), s0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
